patthana21.49:1.1: Naāsavañceva naanāsavañca nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sāsavo ceva no ca āsavo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.49:2.1_0: Naanāsavañceva nano ca āsavaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sāsavo ceva
patthana21.49:2.1_1: no ca āsavo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā
patthana21.49:2.1_2: tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.49:3.1: (Naāsavañceva naanāsavaṁ naanidassanasappaṭighamūlepi purimanayena tīṇiyeva.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… aññamaññe ekaṁ …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.49:4.1_0: Naāsavañceva naanāsavañca naanidassanaappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sāsavo ceva no ca
patthana21.49:4.1_1: āsavo anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ,
